name: Chess Mess
description:
USE Q and E to rotate the map!!!!

Charge chess pieces into each other in a physics based chess game where in order to eliminate pieces you have to push them over the board!

We hope you enjoy, this was our first game jam! :D

We only managed to finish the first map for the jam.
But we have the second in Drive for whoever wants to play it:

https://drive.google.com/open?id=1ci9tx9PU11DMxJLgy97HybW07zfi9rf1

For Mark Brown Game Jam 2018! A gridless Chess with crazy physics!

Rafael de Miguel - Design, Coding

Pablo Campos - Design, Coding, Music

Yeray Pachón - Design, Art

Alba García - Art, Enviroment

Jaime Salgado - Art, Enviroment
